content: --तपस् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} an ascetic who in summer practises penance sitting in the middle of four fires with the sun burning right over his head; <ab>cf.</ab> हविर्भुजामेधवतां चतुर्णां मध्ये ललाटंतपसप्तसप्तिः <ls>R. 13. 41</ls> and <ls>Ku. 5. 23</ls>; and <ls>Ms. 6. 23</ls> and <ls>Śi. 2. 51</ls> also.
